channel.title: hadoop on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in hadoop on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Google Dataproc
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Introduction Google Dataproc is a fast and easy-to-use, fully managed cloud service for running Apache Spark and Hadoop workloads. It allows users to process and analyze large-scale data efficiently and at scale.

item.title: MapReduce
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: What is MapReduce? Let’s start with an example. We are the head of census bureau for the state of California and tasked with finding the finding the population of all cities in California.
